High Priest Maximilian:

Interested in Magic Lamp? I have seen you examining it closely, so I was waiting that you come to me to speak about it.

Magic Lamp capacity is 300 points. It can be filled during your hunt when you kill monsters and get experience. As soon as the lamp is filled, you can play the game. It's a pity it cannot be played whenever you want.

But don't worry, if your lamp is empty - it's getting filled very fast!
